developers.title: The Mobify Platform
developers.intro: The Mobify Platform consists of the latest mobile technology and best practices, adapted specifically for retailers. Features like Progressive Web Apps, Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP), and native apps come together to create fast, engaging mobile experiences that convert visitors and drive revenue for your business.

blocks.title: Accelerated Mobile Pages ⚡️ (AMP)
blocks.info: AMP provides a near-instant first page load when your customers arrive through search engines and distribution platforms.

blocks.info: Web push notifications enable your users to receive notifications on their device through a web browser without installing an app. Web push notifications are now part of Mobify's Progressive Web Apps.
